title: Charming 3 Bedroom Condo (Gym Included) Available Oct 15th
map_address: 615 Boren Ave, Unit 8 near Cherry St
posting_body: Built in 1909 & restored in the 1990s, this RARE peaceful, end unit boasts 3 bedrooms, updated bathroom, original oak hardwood floors, ample storage & closets, gas range, & in-unit laundry.
Located @ the top of First Hill, this charming condo is steps away from the Frye Art Museum w/ easy access to downtown, Pioneer Square, Capitol Hill, & SLU.
Don't miss out on calling this historic landmark home!
Because we own NW Fitness, the gym one block away, your rental includes a membership at this facility.
Internet, water, sewer, and garbage are also included in the rent pricing.
